file_content.text: With the holocron secured, I've been ordered to take a day off. Thank you.
You have the holocron! Good. Now take it to Lord Urduun.
Every second wasted is another secret the Jedi crack.
My lord, a moment please. The blasted Jedi are interfering again!
Agent Vikurs, sir. Glad you're here. The blasted Jedi are at it again!
Hunter, a job for you. The blasted Jedi are at it again!
Am I glad to see you. The blasted Jedi have done it again!
They've uncovered a holocron. Normally I wouldn't lose sleep over a Jedi knickknack, but we intercepted an SIS transmission.
This holocron's packed with condemning historic intel on House Thul. Crimes, barbaric acts--it could cost us Alderaan! We can't--! Phew. Chest pain. It'll pass.
This holocron must be silenced, even if it means grinding it to dust.
They won't succeed.
Agreed, my lord.
House Thul doesn't strike me as the atrocity type. Not sure if I should be impressed or worried.
Barbaric acts? Who knew.
Whatever they did, they went to great lengths covering it up. Unfortunately, someone made a record in that holocron.
If the Empire possessed that intel, House Thul would never dare defy us.
We could use that holocron.
Good thought, sir. Always useful to have something to hang over our allies' heads.
Sounds like you Imps would love to get your hands on this holocron.
So you want me to steal it.
To put it bluntly, yes.
Holocron?
Holographic chronicles. They're small devices... store incredible amounts of data, and... well, the specifics aren't pertinent.
Chest pain? Sounds serious.
It's just indigestion. Need to focus on the holocron.
The Jedi just started deciphering the blasted thing. Perfect timing, too. Right when my stress meds run out.
As we speak, Jedi are trying to crack the holocron's secrets. Only a Sith of your strength can secure it.
We need your expertise, agent. Someone must infiltrate the Jedi research lab and secure that holocron.
I won't pretend this is an easy job, but we need that holocron secured.
The Empire needs you to take that holocron. Soon. Before they decode it and I collapse from exhaustion.
The holocron will be ours.
Thank you. I'm breathing easier already.
I'll get your holocron. You arrange my payment.
I'm on it.
It's a deal.
This will be easy.
Get that holocron, then give it to Lord Urduun. And teach those blasted Jedi a less--ah! Phew. I'm alright. Just go.
I think not. [Refuse quest]
So much for lowering my blood pressure.
This job's killing me.
